mapper.select: select distinct d.str_flag from user_role a left join role b on (a.role_id=b.id and a.domain_id=b.domain_id) left join role_permission c on (b.id=c.role_id and b.domain_id=c.domain_id) left join permission d on (c.permission_id=b.id and c.domain_id=d.domain_id) where b.enabled=1 and d.str_flag is not null and a.domain_id=#{domainId} and a.uid=#{uid}
